channel.title: Five Year Hypercycle: New Appendix N Cyberpunk?
channel.description: On the Gauntlet Blog I ask about new cyberpunk media produced in the last five years: what's interesting? what new directions does it go in? I list a few things but am trying to crowdsource suggestions and input. https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/five-year-hypercycle-new-appendix-n-cyberpunk

item.title: Five Year Hypercycle: New Appendix N Cyberpunk?
item.dc:creator: @edige23
item.description:
@edige23 wrote:

On the Gauntlet Blog I ask about new cyberpunk media produced in the last five years: what’s interesting? what new directions does it go in? I list a few things but am trying to crowdsource suggestions and input.

THE GAUNTLET

Five Year Hypercycle: New Appendix N Cyberpunk?

For those not in the know an "Appendix N" presents a list of inspirational books for games and gaming. Gygax presented the first one as suggested sources in the AD&D Dungeon Master’s Guide. While...

Read full topic
